title: Neighbors from Hell: Kimberlee Morton's nightmare
itunes:title: Neighbors from Hell: Kimberlee Morton's nightmare
description:
Your worst experience with a bad neighbor might be frustration over a barking dog or a junked car parked on their lawn, but Kimberlee Morton's "neighbor from hell" raped her. Nancy Grace looks at Kimberlee's and other neighbor horrors in this Crime Stories episode. She is joined by Kimberlee Morton, who is now victims' advocate, Bob Borzotta, who chronicles such stories in his book "Neighbors From Hell," New York psychologist Dr. Chloe Carmichael, Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCollum, and reporter Robyn Walensky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
